Name: Teaching Core Vocabulary (TEACH)
Description: TEACH, the Teaching Core Vocabulary, is a lightweight vocabulary providing terms to enable teachers to relate things in their courses together. The Teaching Core Vocabulary is based on practical requirements set by providing seminar and course descriptions as Linked Data.
Intended Use: Semantic annotation of teaching and course-related data

Name: ISO 37120 Indicators Ontology
Description: Ontology providing semantic representation of ISO 37120 city indicators (quality of life, city services, education).
Publisher / Source: Global Cities Institute  University of Toronto
Intended Use: Representing city performance indicators in Linked Data

Name: ISTEX Metadata Vocabulary
Description: Vocabulary describing scientific articles and metadata from the ISTEX corpus.

Name: Education Ontology (EDU)
Description: Ontology describing educational institutions and learning activities.
Intended Use: Describing educational structures, curricula, and learning resources

Name: European Skills, Competences, Qualifications and Occupations
Description: Ontology for representing the ESCO taxonomy (skills, competences, qualifications, occupations).
Intended Use: Semantic annotation of skills and occupations
Typical Use with: HR datasets, job portals, qualification frameworks

Name: Agent Certification Ontology
Description: This document specifies a vocabulary for asserting the existence of official endorsements or certifications of agents, such as people and organizations.

Name: Simulation Ontology
Description: An ontology to describe associations between things. Although this ontology was designed with music similarity in mind, it can readily be applied to other domains. @en
